title: Smigy Playground Venue Information and Details
blurb: Explore Smigy Playground for family fun and activities.
description: Smigy Playground offers a variety of play areas and activities suitable for families and children. It's a great place for kids to have fun and engage in active play. The venue is available for corporate events, private parties, and grand openings. Smigy provides a safe and enjoyable environment for children to explore and play, with various play structures and interactive elements designed to stimulate their imagination and physical activity. Parents can relax while their children have a memorable experience in a well-maintained and secure setting. Smigy Playground is dedicated to creating fun and engaging experiences for families.
full_address: 10 Paya Lebar Road, PLQ Mall #03-05/06, Singapore 409057

title: SmiGy Paya Lebar Quarter Mall Playground Venue
blurb: Indoor playground at Paya Lebar Quarter Mall.
description: SmiGy at Paya Lebar Quarter Mall offers a safe and engaging indoor playground experience for children. The facility includes various play areas designed to stimulate creativity and physical activity. It is an ideal location for families looking to provide their children with a fun and active playtime environment. The playground features soft play equipment, climbing structures, and interactive games suitable for toddlers and older kids. Parents can relax in designated seating areas while supervising their children. SmiGy is committed to providing a clean and well-maintained space for kids to enjoy.
full_address: Paya Lebar Quarter Mall 10 Paya Lebar Road, PLQ Mall #03-05/06, Singapore

full_address: Paya Lebar Quarter Mall 10 Paya Lebar Road, PLQ Mall #03-05/06, Singapore 409057 8797 3001
